name: Firebase Notifications
description: Send high-velocity targeted push via Google's Firebase Notifications Console

custom_configuration_fields.label: Plugin enabled
custom_configuration_fields.label_tooltip: Disable plugin if you do not want to use plugin or require enable plugin after application start

custom_configuration_fields.tooltip_text: When checked, this field enables debug builds to support sending push notifications, but disables other debug functionality. For more details, Click Here
Upload Notification Extension Provisioning Profile for Store builds only

custom_configuration_fields.label: Custom sound files
custom_configuration_fields.label_tooltip: Please upload a zip file to provide the custom sounds mp3 files to be used with FCM custom sound parameter.

custom_configuration_fields.label: Default topics
custom_configuration_fields.tooltip_text: Topics to subscribe to, separated with comma

custom_configuration_fields.label: Default Localized topics
custom_configuration_fields.tooltip_text: Topics to subscribe to, separated with comma that will have appended language (ex. general-en)
